text: Mark Platt (born 29 March 1973) is a Canadian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Peterborough, Ontario Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:Rowers at the 1995 Pan American Games
title: Mark Platt (rower)
